channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Why Indian-origin woman, living in the US for 30 years, was detained by ICE
How FBI foiled big New Year Eve’s terror plot targeting Los Angeles
Who is the Brown University shooter? 3 days after attack, why are there no answers?
Goa nightclub fire: What happens next as the Luthra brothers land in India from Thailand?
Why Modi’s Ethiopia visit matters as India prepares to lead Brics
Who is Nick Reiner, Hollywood director Rob Reiner’s son, arrested after his murder?
How PM Modi’s Jordan visit anchors India’s West Asia strategy
item.description: For a nation seeking to deepen engagement across West Asia without becoming entangled in its sectarian politics, Jordan offers both accessibility and credibility

item.title: Gaza ceasefire set to enter phase two, but lasting peace requires enduring solutions
item.description: Finding the right set of Palestinian people to run the government and excluding Hamas leaders from any role is going to be a big challenge

item.title: Trump’s new foreign policy document is bad news for India
item.description: In the new US National Security Strategy, India’s strategic weight has undergone a drastic erosion

item.title: PM Modi in Amman: Exploring the multifaceted significance of India-Jordan ties
item.description: Jordan provides a rare case of political stability in the region, where the shifting sands can cause ripples with profound ramifications

item.title: How Bhutan has a special place in India’s neighbourhood first policy
item.description: Bhutan stands as the clearest expression of Neighbourhood First—where India’s strategy is measured not in statements, but in shared power grids, seamless connectivity, sustained financing and deep-rooted trust

item.title: Why it's time for US to revise its Nato commitment
item.description: The US, whose main adversary is China, not Russia, backs a military alliance that has endangered Europe by prolonging the Ukraine War by obstructing peace efforts
